text:
Being clumsy, that’ll make you feel
dumb right there, being clumsy.
Raise your hand if you’re clumsy.

Actually don’t, you’ll poke an eye out,
probably your own. Don’t do that, no.

Like, no, that show was going
great til that happened.

You know why being clumsy
makes you feel dumb?

Cause you haven’t mastered
basic human movement yet.

And you’ve only been working on that since,
uh, you were born. Come on, lay off me.

I’m just kidding. I do clumsy
stuff all the time.

Just clumsy stupid
stuff all the time.

One day I had the worst grocery
store experience of my entire life.

First of all, I walk up
to a door that I thought
was an automatically opening door.

Because we live in America and what,
am I gonna do that on my own?

I’m not gonna tear a rotator
cuff getting in here, come on.

Go ice my shoulder,
get a bag of ice.

So, I walk up to the door and about
eight feet away from it I just stop.

Hello. Open for me.
This door is a piece of junk.

Then I start inching
forward like slow.

I wanna find out the exact point
at which the sensors go off.

I’m like, making unnecessary movements
like a bunch of jazz hands. Hello.

Walking all the way to the door.
I get all the way up to the glass.

Standing like this. Nose to the glass.
I’m like, “What a piece of junk!”

A woman comes up to the other side of the door
and I’m like, we’re in this weird stand-off.
And I’m like, “Door’s broken!
Stuck in there. Probably gonna die.
Kidding, I’ll go get help.”

And she goes, “Pull, moron!” “
Oh, pull. Oh, pull.

I struggle reading banner
form four letter words.”
Tricky.
Such a dumb thing.

Then in the store that day I did the dumbest,
clumsiest thing I’ve ever done in my entire life, right?
I was in the frozen waffles section,

grabbing a box of waffles cause
I’m adult and I gotta cook dinner.
It’s my night.

Pulling a box of waffles
off the shelf.
Elbow an old woman
right in the face. And,
she went down hard!
Cause I dunno if you know this,

but old ladies can’t take
a punch like at all.

It’s an awful thing to say
and they’re really bad at it.

She went down. So I was like,
“Did you bet on this fight? Who took this?
Come on, we’re in the first aisle.”

I felt terrible. I did that joke the other
night. Some guy just goes,
“Did you leave her there?”

Yeah, that’s what I did.
I elbowed an old woman,

knocked her to the ground,
and then walked off,

and was like, “No-one help her,
that’s called natural selection.
Nobody help her.

No, get off! We’re stronger
as a people now, trust me.”
That’s how Darwinism works.

Trust me, next time this old lady’s in the frozen
waffle section, she’s bringing her A-game.
Elbows out, triple threat.

I was like, “Let go of my ankles, lady,
I saw you looking at my box. Come on.

” Of course I helped her up. My God.
It was the worst day of my life.

Cause she was the cutest,
oldest woman,

like ever made in the history
of old people.
Like, I helped her up and she goes,
“Why did you do that?”

Aah! How much worse did
this just get right now?

She thinks I did it on purpose.
Like, she wants to know a reason.

How do you even answer that question?
Like, “Oh, yeah, sure okay, don’t you…

Yeah, okay, alright. Next time you walk out
of Bingo Tab, this happens again, okay?

I’m here to collect 75 cents,
I’m not leaving without it.”

I didn’t even know what
to say to that. She’s like,

“Why did you do…”I don’t know!
I don’t know! I don’t know
what I said to this poor old woman.

Because I kinda blacked out
during the whole experience.
But I’ll tell you how it felt.
